projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Customer get the following problem, One specific device (belong to a their client) get incompatible problem when try to download app from google store. (attached screen)

But I can't find any reason why, they did no use any <user-feature> tage. 

Please help to address this, or and idea will be help. (attached tiapp.xml file and Androidmanifest.XML file in case)

Device Info
Model: Vodacom Smart Kicka
Location:  South Africa
Android version: Android 4.4 Kitkat
fields.summary: One specific device get incompatible problem

comments.body:
[~sliang] Could you provide more device info? Eg. Exact Model number etc etc. 

Also what settings or restrictions did they put in their Google Play store? Certain settings might prevent a user from downloading an app as well. eg Country restriction, etc etc.
